location.name: Idle
location.label: Waiting before sending a new request

location.name: Waiting
location.label: t <= LATENCY_DEADLINE
Waiting for a response from the REST service

transition.label: ack?
Received a response, go back to waiting for next request
sendData!
Send a REST request to the service

location.name: Listening
location.label: Waiting for a REST request from the subsystem

location.name: Processing
location.label: t <= PROCESS_TIME_MAX + PRODUCE_TIME
Handling the received data and preparing a response

location.name: Responding
location.label: Sending a response back to the subsystem

transition.label: ack!
Response sent, ready for the next request
sendData?
Received a REST request, start processing

query.comment: Check that the system never gets stuck (no deadlocks)
Every request from the subsystem will always get a response
The subsystem never waits longer than 100 ms for a response
